label: 10. Who legally (according to state law) owns the land/sea on which the ICCA is situated?

options.label: Communal: owned by one or more communities/indigenous peoples
Individual landowners: owned by individual landowners
For-profit organisation(s): owned by for-profit organisations
Non-profit organisation(s): owned by non-profit organisations
Joint ownership: owned collectively by two or more of the above entities
Multiple ownership: different parts of the land/sea are owned by different entities
Contested: more than one entity claims ownership of the ICCA
Not Reported: ownership type is not known
